page.title: 03ENTERTAINMENT IN SCREDINGTON
page.content: The Gala comes to the village every year.There are stalls and prizes to win. It is very exciting. There is Bingo and every now and then there is a childrens disco in the Village Hall. There are carboot sales,sales of work and coffee mornings.Also held in the Village Hall,for adults, there is Slimnastics club,Sports club and Drama group. There are meetings of the Womens Institute. Busy Bees is a fund raising group carried on in the members houses. People have to go to Sleaford to the cinema golf,football and swimming. Occasionally there is a circus and a fair in Sleaford,four miles away.
